boardgame.name: Cubist
boardgame.description: In Cubist, you and your opponents are architects competing to build a grand and inspiring new Modern Art Museum including its interior sculptures or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;installations._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; Aptly enough, your building materials are cubes, or more precisely, dice!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On each turn you roll two dice and place them in your studio as raw materials for your cubist sculptures. From there you position these dice to complete commissioned installations for the museum. Dice with identical numbers can be stacked on top of one another to give your sculpture elevation and grandeur. Dice with adjacent numbers go next to one another to construct unconventional footprints of modernism. You can press your luck by committing to a certain risky commission_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;hoping that no one else will complete it first_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;or play it safe by locking up your dice for later use._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You can also use your dice to enlist the aid of masters of modern art like Juan Gris, Franz Marc and Olga Rozanova. Each installation you complete allows you to contribute dice to the building of the Museum itself. You will have to sculpt cleverly but quickly to get the new Museum named after you!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 2 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to follow through with the transaction. PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. All orders are shipping Priority Mail. RETURNS: All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. We will accept returns within 5 days of your receipt of the order. We only accept returns on items which are in their original condition. Original condition means, the game have not been played and all parts are in the same condition as they were when you received the game. We only refund shipping costs if the return is a result of our error. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

***Listing for Steve Aronson (zastrygon). If this is not you, please do not purchase*** Condition: Very Good Sweeteners: Cubist: Museum Expansion Pack Cubist: Additional Installation Cards Cubist: The Attic Payment/Delivery: Cash or PayPal. I will be arriving at GenCon on Wednesday and staying thru Sunday evening. Would prefer to trade Wednesday if possible. Will exchange contact info and arrange a meetup point.

Factory sealed in original shrink wrap; includes The Attic, The Museum Expansion Pack, and the Additional Installation Cards. Shipping is $14.00 for Priority Mail (which includes insurance). PayPal payment can be sent to bitva2@yahoo.com, thanks!
